alert.note: Alert for Duval; La Salle; McMullen; Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 12:47AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Duval, southeastern La Salle, east central Webb and southwestern McMullen Counties through 130 AM CDT... At 1246 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 19 miles west of Freer, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Duval, southeastern La Salle, east central Webb and southwestern McMullen Counties. This includes US Highway 59 between mile markers 784 and 792. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
